Getting started with Yeoman

01 January 2014

Continuing onwards

Using Yeoman with Angular-Generator Link

Install Yeoman globally with

$ npm install -g yo
$ npm install -g generator-angular

Make a new directory of where you want to put your app

$ mkdir todo
$ cd todo
$ yo angular

If everything went well, then run

$ grunt server

Update SUCCESS!

If youâ€™d like to read more about how I got on with using Yeoman with Angular, I write an extension of this post with a relevant link later.

Thanks for reading!
